review: Amazing, clear, and good price. I've been shopping around for a decent-sized monitor for quite a while now. There are literally thousands to choose from, but I was working on a budget. This monitor came in to save the day. The box it comes in is really professional and neatly packed, it sets up really easily too. I do not regret the purchase at all.
Very solid product, on time, good value, and meets my need for a work monitor. Easy to set up. Would be slightly better if it were more adjustable, but all in all very pleased.
Perfect monitor if you Know how to calibrate it! HDR isn't great though. Worth it once you calibrate with RGB color hues & saturation. So good many settings.

The color quality of this IPS monitor compared to my VA is WOW! The difference in the sharper image is crazy! I enjoy the playing Rainbow 6, Destiny 2 and CoD in 240 hz instead of 144 makes a difference! Overall a really solid product!

This is an awesome shirt. I have worn it for 3-4 years now. If washing at home the color does run at first wash so do not wash the darker with your whites. Soak overnight and wash separate for your first wash.
This is my second purchase of this top. It is warm, comfortable snd very soft. It washes well, runs a little small, it is semi-fitted, so I always go up one size for the best fit.
So adorable and fits great. My son loves wearing it too! He has worn it quite a few times and the fabric is holding up. My little one looks like a little man in this!

I don't think this scent is groundbreaking, but not every scent has to be, does it? I love how simple and elegant this scent is at the same time. I love the vanilla orchid vibe I'm getting from this and it's beautiful. Overall this is a nice balance of floral and sweet (but not full on gourmand) and I really like that. I think this is a versatile scent and great for layering as well.
Exactly what it looked like in the picture. Size and color is perfect. Highly recommend!
